description: Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the services of a general contractor for the construction of a laboratory building for research on heavy vehicles.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of Transport, is inviting contractors to submit proposals for the construction of a laboratory building at the Motor Vehicle Test Centre (MVTC) in Blainville. This project involves the construction of a specialized facility for research on commercial vehicles.

#### Tender Details

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | EF997-240566: Construction of a Laboratory for Commercial Vehicles at the MVTC |
| **Reference Number** | WS4230367587-Doc4230752365 |

| **Solicitation Number** | WS4230367587 |
| **Publication Date** | September 27, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | November 23, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time |
| **Amendment Date** | November 22, 2023 |

#### Service Requirements

The successful contractor will be responsible for the construction of a laboratory building for the MVTC. The scope of work includes:

* Non-residential building construction services
* Specialized public building construction services
* Installation and maintenance of service station equipment

#### Contract Award Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the bidder submitting the lowest priced proposal.

#### Eligibility and Exclusions

This tender is open to bidders who have a valid Business Number and are registered in the applicable general agreement. Bidders who are not eligible to participate in this process will be rejected.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns related to this tender, please contact Fahad Zanoun, Contracting Authority, TPSGC/PSPC at fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Access to Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and plans and specifications, are available on the Ariba website at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17567515?extsite=MTc1Njc1MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
